when-person-moved-in.required: Tell us when the tenant moved into the property
when-person-moved-in.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
when-person-moved-in.date: Enter a real date of birth
when-person-moved-in.after: This service only applies to tenants who moved in after 30 November 2014
when-person-moved-in.before: This date must not be in the future

tenant-dob.test: [X] cannot be born after they moved into the rental property. Enter a date after [Y].
tenant-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
tenant-dob.over18: The [X] must be 18 years or older. The right to rent scheme does not apply to children.

privacy-check.required: Confirm you have read the Data Protection statement
